title: Part 1 - [NSFW] Pam & Tommy, Celeb Sex Tapes and The Evolution of Porn (Guest Starring Angelica Swiss)
itunes:title: Part 1 - [NSFW] Pam & Tommy, Celeb Sex Tapes and The Evolution of Porn (Guest Starring Angelica Swiss)
itunes:subtitle: When we find out what my little pony, magic wands, and an apron all have in common
description:
Angelica Swiss (former dominatrix, former kink.com employee, and current cam model) joins us this week to chat about the new Hulu show, Pam & Tommy, and how Hollywood got it wrong with Pamela Anderson. We deep dive into the culture around celebrity sex tapes (including Kim Kardashian and Paris Hilton's), how the internet and rise of social media has completely deteriorated our attention span as well as changed the adult entertainment/ porn industry, and giggle over what the best sex toys on the market for you and all your “vanilla” friends.


Join us this week as we get to watch Aleena squirm while Angelica Swiss schools us on all things adult entertainment!


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
